Name: Wild West Dynasty: The New Hope Gazette
About the game: Howdy, Stranger! Are you ready for an adventure in the era of gunslingers, cowboys and stagecoaches? Until the release of Wild West Dynasty, you'll find out everything you need to know to be prepared for the intense excursion into the American West of the 19th century. This is the only place to get exclusive information and background reports on the highly anticipated mix of city-building, role-playing and survival set in a vast open world. In addition, you'll get carefully researched articles about the Wild West, exciting videos, and much more in the stylishly presented digital newspaper. If you purchase all eight issues, you will receive a loyalty bonus of 20% off the purchase price of Wild West Dynasty (*). Bring the Wild West home with the New Hope Gazette! The official interactive magazine Carefully reasearched background-stories First-hand information and insights from the developers Discount for Wild West Dynasty on Steam (*) Issue #1 for free! (*) available for a limited time after release of the game Wild West Dynasty
